abstract: Facebook shares plunged in after-hours trading after the social network reported its first earnings as a public company. DealBook combed through the announcement to pluck out some key points.
snippet: Facebook shares plunged in after-hours trading after the social network reported its first earnings as a public company. DealBook combed through the announcement to pluck out some key points.
lead_paragraph: Facebook has reported its first earnings report as a public company. And investors apparently didn’t like what they saw.

headline.main: A Deeper Look at Facebook’s Earnings Report

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Peter Eavis
